ECSchema.description: Base schema for the Earthwork domain.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:PhysicalElement created by earthwork activities to build subgrade or to raise the level of the ground in general.
Defines a shared set of properties and classification (the 'type') that can be associated with a ew:Fill instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific ew:Fill is an instance of the defined ew:FillType.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:PhysicalElement modeling the volume of material to be removed from existing terrain or road structure by excavation or other means.
Defines a shared set of properties and classification (the 'type') that can be associated with a ew:Cut instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific ew:Cut is an instance of the defined ew:CutType.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:PhysicalElement capturing the designed grade of ground typically after introducing modifications to the existing terrain.
Defines a shared set of properties and classification (the 'type') that can be associated with a ew:SurfaceGrade instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific ew:SurfaceGrade is an instance of the defined ew:SurfaceGradeType.
